name: photovoltaics, electric installation for 3kWp module, at building | photovoltaics, electric installation for 3kWp module, at building | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5465/documentation

This infrastructure dataset represents the production of different components and their commissioning for the electric installation of a 3kWp building integrated photovoltaic plant. The electric installation includes all parts between the panel and the grid, but not the inverter as it is modeled in a separate dataset due to its importance. It therefore provides the parts for the connection of the 3kWp PV installation to the grid. ;The different parts considered are:;-	lightning protection;-	cabling in the PV panel area;-	fuse box;-	cabling from the PV panels to inverter;- cabling from the inverter to the electric meter

From delivery of the needed materials and parts. 

This activity ends with the finished components of the electric installation.

This dataset includes:
- Materials for the production of the different parts 
 - Energy use for metal processing (copper wire drawing)
 - decommissioning of the installation parts
 
This dataset doesn't include the energy use for the mounting of the electric installations as this is included in the assembly of all parts for a 3kWp PV plant.
It doesn't include the inverter, as this is modelled in a separate dataset due to its importance.
category: F:Construction/43:Specialized construction activities/439:Other specialized construction activities/4390:Other specialized construction activities

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The calculation of the annual production volume of the reference product is based on data from 2008. It does not represent an average of the time period 1992-2008.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: All electric installations for a photovoltaic system with a capacity of 3kWp. The included materials are summarized in the following table.;Source of the table: Jungbluth et al. 2012, p.118
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
The calculation of the annual production volume of the reference product is based on data from 2008.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Detailed analysis of materials for one product in a diploma thesis.

exchanges.description:
Literature value. Used in 
 - the (grounding) wires and the heat shrink tube from PV panel to inverter
 - the fuse box
 - the cabling at PV panel area
 - the grounding wires from inverter to electric meter.  
The Radox 125-cable cladding is approximated with HDPE-plastic.

See also tab. 11.29 in Jungbluth et al. 2012.
